Address.label: Address
Address.value: 2 CHURCH STREET,CLARENDON HOUSE, HAMILTON, HM11, Bermuda

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Signet Jewelers Ltd is a retailer of diamond jewelry. Its merchandise mix includes bridal, fashion, watches and others. The bridal category includes engagement, wedding and anniversary purchases. Its segments are the North America segment, the International segment, and the Other segment. The North America segment contributes to the majority of the revenue.
